titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3,5,-Triazine-2,4-diamine, 6-[2-(2-undecyl-1H-imidazol-1-yl)ethyl]-(9Cl).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3,5,-Triazine-2,4-diamine, 6-[2-(2-undecyl-1H-imidazol-1-yl)ethyl]-(9Cl).
